description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Aino Vonge Corry - Teacher, technical conference editor, and retrospectives facilitator

ABSTRACT
Anti-Patterns are like patterns, only more informative. With anti-patterns you will first see what patterns reoccur in "bad" retrospectives and then you will see how to avoid, or remedy, the situation. [...]

Download slides and read the full abstract here:
https://gotocon.com/cph-2016/presentations/show_talk.jsp?oid=7772
